articles.author: Emma Duffy
articles.content: TWO MORE IRISH athletes have progressed and set stunning personal bests at the European Indoor Championships in Torun, Poland, after Sarah Lavin qualified for the 60m hurdles semi-final and Sean Tobi… [+3236 chars]
articles.description: Nadia Power, Mark English, Cian McPhillips and Phil Healy are all in action in the business end of their respective events this evening.
articles.title: In-form Irish duo Lavin and Tobin clock huge PBs to advance at European Indoors - The42

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.description: Hans-Joachim Watzke is not expecting any crazy offers for Erling Haaland or Jadon Sancho, as he feels dark clouds are gathering over European football.
articles.title: [GOAL LIVE] ‘2연승’ 정정용 감독, “승격 생각하면 큰일난다” - Goal.com

articles.description: European diplomat says his colleagues would prefer to have shots being given in their home country.
articles.title: China offers Covid-19 vaccine to foreign diplomats – but will they take it? - South China Morning Post
